text: Zeki Alasya (18 April 1943 - 8 May 2015) was a Turkish actor and director. He began his acting career in the 1970s on television and movies, and directed about 20 movies. He also worked with comedian Metin AkpÄ±nar. Alasya was born Istanbul and was of Turkish Cypriot ancestry. He died from liver disease, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Turkey Category:Turkish stage actors Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish movie directors Category:Turkish screenwriters Category:Turkish television actors
title: Zeki Alasya
